name: Exterminator Ltd.
description:
In a world, where you (The Player) are a part of a major contract exterminator company in the known galactic universe. You embark on a journey throughout the cosmos to free planets from known infestations and enemy threats. 

This game of mass extermination has vast weapons, armor, and vastly destructive devices known to man. This is a level-based game, you get paid in credits after each level in a level summary. Credits can be used to buy new 'toys' for you to use in your extermination adventures.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Jump

LMB - Fire/Shoot

Mouse - Camera Movement
